reviewText: i loved this documentary, but of course would love to have heard more detailed commentary from those who lived the experience...or their descendents...it was, i'm sure unique...esp. due to the almost state of isolation...i wish that the issue of colorism had been addressed...it is a factor in every african american community...i wonder how this community's young people have been affected by the computer age...i would recommend this film to all who are curious about how blacks fair in america...
